name: Tengfei Jyu
story: Xiang Tong grew up in a small village in China. He joined the military at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his discipline and tactical skills. He is now a respected sergeant and squad leader in the OPFOR forces, leading his team with precision and efficiency. Xiang is deeply committed to his family and his Buddhist faith, which provides him with a sense of inner peace in the midst of the chaos of war.
